mapper.select: select concat(d.id, d.name) as name from train_course_category d left join sys_role_dept rd on d.id = rd.id where d.del_flag = '0' and rd.role_id = #{roleId} order by d.parent_id, d.order_num
select count(1) from train_course where train_course_category_id = #{id} and del_flag = '0'
where name=#{name} and parent_id = #{parentId} and del_flag = '0'

select d.id, d.parent_id, d.parent_ids, d.name, d.order_num, d.del_flag,d.status, (select name from train_course_category where id = d.parent_id) parent_name from train_course_category d where d.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into train_course_category( id, parent_id, name, parent_ids, order_num, create_by, create_time, status )values( #{id}, #{parentId}, #{name}, #{parentIds}, #{orderNum}, #{createBy}, sysdate(), #{status} )
mapper.delete: update train_course_category set del_flag = '1' where id = #{id}
